website_summaries.verdict: Visine is a well-trusted eye drop brand, and these live up to their reputation by quickly alleviating eye redness.
pros: Provides instant relief from dry and red eyes without stinging
These are easy to apply to eyes, even for those whose eyes are sensitive to drops
Ideal for those exposed to eye irritants, or for after eyes are exposed to chlorine
cons: Comes in a small, single bottle (half ounce) and may run out quickly

customer_reviews.title: These are very good eye drops
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eyes and often my eyes get very red no matter what I put in them. But this product helps on those occasional days and does not make my eyes more dry. The only thing I can say that was negative was the packing. I purchased two boxes of eye drops and they were in a box with 12 cans of dog food. So the eye drop boxes were totally crushed. I think they should have been placed in bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: I've used many eye drops, these work the best
customer_reviews.text: Like the headline says, I've used many many different types of eyedrops over the years. Some have left me with dry eye, some have burned, some feel too.. oily? This one is perfect. I've been using this same one for years now and I love it. My friends/family who needed a drop or two never complained about it either. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Claudin

customer_reviews.title: Effective, but sold in laughably small portions.
customer_reviews.text: I have to use the product a couple times for it to be effective. Really, you should put a but at your duct and blink it into your eyes, and I go though the bottle very quickly to use enough for it to work, which it does. They really need much larger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Visine Advanced Redness + Irritation Relief Lubricant Eye Drops for Dry, Red Eyes, 0.5 fl. oz
customer_reviews.text: Great for your eyes as well as to un-stiffen your mascara...just a few drops will make it last !
customer_reviews.author: lugenia brown

customer_reviews.title: A staple in my makeup bag.
customer_reviews.text: This does the trick, every time. It works instantly and makes a noticeable difference in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Our Fine House

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've used these drops before. They work well. Easy to use. Just pour drops in the eyes. I use them when I feel my eyes are dry and itchy.
customer_reviews.author: Wasah Malik

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but doesn’t calm down all the redness
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, but doesn’t help as much as I’d like for eye redness. Only moisture.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? it gets the red out and it lubricate my contacts. My only complaint is the price.

customer_reviews.title: Visine is a must have for me
customer_reviews.text: I regularly use this product, it works well for my dry,tired,itchy eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: Works well but burns my eyes! Regular visine doesn’t burn at all.

customer_reviews.title: Soothes My Eyes
customer_reviews.text: The genuine Visine always soothes my eyes from irritation and takes away redness quick. Thanks.

customer_reviews.title: NO EFFECT
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it works for some people, but I might as well as put pure water in my eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Very good drops, reduces redness in seconds
customer_reviews.text: Very good drops, reduces redness in seconds. Sometimes they burn slightly once put in eye, but it goes away after a second or two. Overall good product and works exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro F.

customer_reviews.title: It  is  soothing  to  my  69  year  old  eyes  after  cataract  surgery  2  years  ago.
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to use this product on a Very regular basis from now on.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Visine Advanced Redness Plus Irritation Relief Eye Drops does exactly what the name says. No explanation needed and with the brand everyone knows can be trusted

customer_reviews.title: Visine eye drops
customer_reviews.text: I needed help with my eyes and the irritation I was having. I have tried other products, even a prescription that I have and non of them helped me like this did. I'm very happy that I selected this as it works for me. Fast shipping and great quality for my money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: It works against pollen
customer_reviews.text: Always had trouble with pollen during spring seasons. Thought I will try this rather than store brands due to ongoing COVID-19 situation did not want to go to pharmacy. The visible worked fine In defending against the pollen relieving all redness. I like it and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: germantowner

customer_reviews.title: Buy Visine
customer_reviews.text: I tried Clear allergy drops and they don't work for me. I've tried numerous eye drops for red eyes and dry eyes and most of them are terrible. Visine does the trick. My red eyes turn white. They feel better. They look better. Don't waste your money on other brands. Year after year, Visine products do what they say they will.
customer_reviews.author: goldilvr

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Expiration date is always far enough out to use before expiring.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: They work well for itchy eyes. There's not a lot to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nekrossai

customer_reviews.title: Eye Drops
customer_reviews.text: I put these eye drops in my eyes and it makes my eyes feel like eyes again opposed to sandpaper.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: works Great
customer_reviews.text: When my eyes are irritating this works great to assist.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Addresses redness but couldn't tell if it was moisturizing. Eyes felt fine (better) after use though.
customer_reviews.author: Zenobia

customer_reviews.title: These drops provide instant all-day relief to dry, burning ...
customer_reviews.text: These drops provide instant all-day relief to dry, burning eyes. My one complaint is that the tip is fairly wide so a lot of the lubricant comes out at once if you are not careful while administering the drops.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: If you are buying this for the same reason I ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this for the same reason I bought this, then yes, it works for that. It's sometimes easier to put them in before your eyes get red.
customer_reviews.author: Malcanth

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: They are eye drops and they work. Not much to complain about. I do not know much about the cost effectiveness but it is awfully convenient
customer_reviews.author: Brainerd Ewarien

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My 1st picture shows what I received which is .28 ounces. The 2nd picture is what was advertised on Amazon. I expected my 1/2 ounce and not almost less than half of that.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Eakin

customer_reviews.title: Have a pair of darn scissors handy to cut the packaging bits!
customer_reviews.text: The actual product is good but the packaging! Holy Cannoli! Thanks to the lovely lid wrap that's wrapped that sucker up tighter than Area 51 - I've now broken three fingernails, a pen lid and even resorted to using my teeth! (Note the frantic lipstick marks) Short of having nail scissors, you're screwed opening this product. Visine people, please get consumer friendly wrapping for your lids. Try unwrapping these beasts in the factory with longer nails... I swear dudes design this bull. I now have to walk around the office for the rest of the day, dealing with customers with three funky fingernails. It's that or running sis blocks back to the pharmacy to buy a nail file! Grrrr.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good quick relief but not very lasting...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product from a different Amazon seller but thoughts remain the same: Makes for a great short-term fix when eyes get extremely dry/red; however, results do not last very long and based on what I have since learned from my Optometrist, using Visine (and equivalents) frequently actually creates a bit of a dependency for your eyes. Your eyes literally get dry more quickly in anticipation of receiving more drops! Use eye lubricants instead - highly recommend Systane or Refresh.
customer_reviews.author: NPchicago

customer_reviews.title: Nicely surprised by how fast and effective these drops are
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been experiencing red fatigued eyes after working too many hours with my computer, because I don’t blink much while my eyes are focused on the screen. So, I decided to give these drops a try and the Visine Advance Relief worked like magic, allowing me to work a few more hours. I was truly surprised by its fast effect, because it’s the first time I’ve ever used this type of eye drops. They helped to relieve the dryness and the red eyes that comes with it, but the fatigue only sleeping truly relieves it, as we all know. Still, the Visine Advance Relief is a great option to keep handy in the office and at home.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful relief for allergy eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I really use this Visine product quite a bit during allergy season, and it does it's job. There is nothing worse than itchy watering eyes, and many times you are not in a position to take allergy medication because of the drowsy side effect. The fall is my worst time for this problem. I use it more often then than the spring, but it really stops the itching. I plan to buy more of this when I run out because it works better than other products I have used in the past. Try it if you have this problem! It will take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good for contact wearers
customer_reviews.text: I wear contacts and, if I wear them for more than about 8 hours, they become sticky feeling and my eyes get very sore. These drops definitely help lubricate my eyes and make it more comfortable to wear my contacts for longer periods. I am deducting one star because, as other reviewers have mentioned, they do sting. However, it was only momentary for me so the intensity must vary between people. All in all, I believe this is a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: LOL

customer_reviews.title: Fixes My Dry and Burning Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from dry and burning eyes which get worse in the fall and winter. These drops make my eyes feel great for most of the day. The bottle seems like it will last a while. I am concerned about anything I put in my eyes. My eye doctor is comfortable with me using Visine products. The product works great and my eyes feel great for most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: scesq

customer_reviews.title: Great Visine product
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if there really is any difference between Visine Advanced and Visine Original, but at the moment, Advanced only costs an extra 10 cents, so why not? I find a bottle lasts over a year. The one I just got says it expires in February of 2017. I use it for seasonal allergies and it does a fantastic job of relieving the dryness and itchiness.
customer_reviews.author: C. Boudreau

customer_reviews.title: relieves my itchy eyes
customer_reviews.text: Fall allergies make my eyes feel dry and itchy. These drops worked very well, providing soothing relief without any stinging at all. Visine is a name I trust and I am very happy with how this advanced product soothes and relieves my itchy eyes. I received the product free to test and review through the Amazon program.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Don't tell anyone but I'm creating a bit with this. I'm usually a homeopathic guy. But I've found that those kinds of issues aren't solved that way. I've tried other brands but they don't always work for relief of dry scratchy eyes or redness. I tried this and immediately had relief and clarity in the white of my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: AshertopiA

customer_reviews.title: Visine 4-evah!
customer_reviews.text: I can't live without my Visine, especially during allergy season (which, for me is both in the spring and fall -- eep!). My poor eyes get so red and itchy but a couple of drops of this magic elixir and they're back to their old selves. A lifelong user!
customer_reviews.author: MaryB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and effective. It delivers quick relief. Not much else to say about this - they're eye drops and they work well for a good price. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brian Klein

customer_reviews.title: Standard eye drop fare from Visine
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say that the 'advanced' title for these Visine drops mean they are something spectacular. However, I cannot do that. They just function like your typical Vising eye drops. Of course, because Visine does such a good job at making eye drops, it means these are still worth getting. My only quibble is that they do not do a good job removing the redness from my eyes. Since that is what they are claiming to be good at, this prevents me from rating them higher. That being said, they still do a solid job at moisturizing the eyes and relieving minor discomfort. I can work with that.
customer_reviews.author: Irish

customer_reviews.title: Not really for allergies, but they do not claim allergy relief either.No sting, does moisturize, did not get rid of all redness.
customer_reviews.text: These did not sting my eyes and feel more moisturizing than normal Visine drops. However, I do not think they help as much with my allergy itchiness. To be fair, they do not claim to help with allergies. If you are looking for allergy drops, I have found that the ones which contain ketotifen fumarate work the best. I buy a generic brand from Walmart. If all you need is some moisture, and a little redness reduction these will do the trick. Easy to dispense as well. They did not completely reduce the redness so I deducted one star.
customer_reviews.author: Two kids mom

customer_reviews.title: Soft Comfortable Drops!
customer_reviews.text: Feels really good as it drops in your eye...not cold and stark, just nice and soft. Don't know whether that's the applicator or the liquid or both. I like the lubricating part of the drop after I take my contact lenses out for the day. I have only used it at night with no contact lenses, and it makes my eyes feel refreshed and ready for bedtime. No crustiness when I wake up in the morning. I'm happy with the product and will continue to use after this bottle is finished.
customer_reviews.author: R M Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for Dry Eyes
customer_reviews.text: When I travel by car, my eyes get very dry and itchy. These drops are soothing and relieve the dryness quickly. I don't know what the “Advanced” title on the bottle means. I find that they work very much like my usual eye drops. I do like the shape of the bottle. My usual eye drops come out too fast and often run down my face. With this bottle, I can easily get one drop in the eye. Visine makes good eye drops and these seem a good addition to their product line.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Famolari

customer_reviews.title: Great eye drops for the short term.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, I can't tell the difference between these and "regular" Visine drops. That said, they do a good job of providing fast, temporary relief to red itchy eyes. Over time of course they wear off and you're back where you started. Ultimately you need to figure out what's causing the problem in the first place and address that. But for the short term these are as good a remedy as you'll find.
customer_reviews.author: Bookenator

customer_reviews.title: I've been a longtime Visine user
customer_reviews.text: I've never really noticed that Visine relieves the redness in my eyes, but it has provided moisture and that's why I use it. Whether it's because of allergies, a late night out or just irritation, a few drops of this has always helped my eyes to feel better and recover. The little bottle lasts a long time and travels easily and for the price it's well worth the results.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Visine Redness Reliever Advanced Relief Eye Drops pretty much do as advertised. If you've used eye drops before then you know what to do. I didn't have any issues.... no stinging or aftereffects. If you have red eyes - whether it be from allergies or a good crying jag, then you want to try these eye drops.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Fischer

customer_reviews.title: I always like to have one of these in stock for allergy ...
customer_reviews.text: I always like to have one of these in stock for allergy season, like now, with mold and ragweed and other pollens in the air. Often I'll use artificial tears, but sometimes you need a little more. It works great with minimal stinging.
customer_reviews.author: Boyzoo

customer_reviews.title: Just like it says
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it says. I got this because my eyes frequently get red from my contacts. Of course, you can't use it with your contacts already in, so that's a bummer, but it does help clear up my eyes once my contacts are out.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey W

customer_reviews.title: Visine Advanced is great. I use Visine eye drops on a regular ...
customer_reviews.text: Visine Advanced is great. I use Visine eye drops on a regular basis for my dry eyes in the morning, afternoon and before bed for my dry eye problems. They have always got the job done and provide relief.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K. Dobbins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works like it said and it got here in no time
customer_reviews.author: jordan martinez

product_meta.title: Visine Advanced Redness + Irritation Relief Lubricant Eye Drops for Dry, Red Eyes, 0.5 fl. oz
product_meta.description: Style:Advanced Redness LubricantFor relief from dry, red eyes, use Visine Advanced Redness + Irritation Relief Eye Drops. This hydrating formula combines the proven redness-relieving power of Visine Original with three moisturizing ingredients to cool, soothe, and refresh irritated and red eyes while protecting against further irritation. Use these moisturizing eye drops to soothe your dry, red eyes after riding on an airplane, staring at a computer screen for a long period of time, or experiencing too much sun or wind exposure. The small 0.5-fluid ounce bottle easily slips into a bag or purse, so you can soothe your red, dry eyes anywhere and get the Red Out.
feature_bullets: 0.5-fluid ounce bottle of Visine Advanced Redness + Irritation Relief Eye Drops relieve minor eye irritation and temporarily relieve dry, red eyes
Formulated with tetrahydrozoline hydrochloride to provide red eye relief along with hydrating moisturizers to soothe, refresh, and cool for irritation and dry eye relief
Eye drops gets the red out to provide redness and eye irritation relief. Visine is backed by 60 years of science and expertise.
Use these moisturizing eye drops to soothe your dry, red eyes after riding on an airplane, staring at a computer screen for a long period of time, or experiencing too much sun or wind exposure.
To use for irritation and dry eye relief, put one to two drops in the affected eye up to four times daily
